mapper.insert: INSERT INTO G_AIR VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(g_No),0)+1 FROM G_AIR),#{airlineNm},#{depAirportNm},#{arrAirportNm},#{economyCharge},#{vihicleId},SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO B_AIR VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(b_No),0)+1 FROM B_AIR),#{airlineNm},#{depAirportNm},#{arrAirportNm},#{economyCharge},#{vihicleId},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: <<<<<<< HEAD SELECT * FROM ( G_AIRLINENM AS airlineNm, G_DEPAIRPORTNM AS depAirportNm, G_DEPAIRPORTNM AS arrAirportNm, G_ECONOMYCHARGE AS economyCharge, G_VIHICLEID AS vihicleId,) FROM G_AIR; ======= SELECT G_AIRLINENM AS airlineNm, G_DEPAIRPORTNM AS depAirportNm, G_DEPAIRPORTNM AS arrAirportNm, G_ECONOMYCHARGE AS economyCharge, G_VIHICLEID AS vihicleId FROM G_AIR >>>>>>> branch 'master' of https://github.com/ryun-k/prog.git
